summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of Lakewood Ave. S. from S. Court St. to Cascadia Ave. S.; certain other streets, avenue and an alley; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting System; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25758 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of payment by bonds.
